text: Dame Norma Christina Elizabeth Major, ( Wagstaff, formerly Johnson; born 12 February 1942) is an English philanthropist. She is the wife of Sir John Major. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:English philanthropists Category:Spouses of prime ministers of the United Kingdom Category:Knights and Dames Commander of the Order of the British Empire
title: Norma Major
